name: Software Generator
description: Generates and compiles source code for the model.  Optionally generates code documentation.

configStructure.name: compile
configStructure.description: Turn off to just generate source files.

configStructure.name: generate_docs
configStructure.description: Turn off to ignorre doc generation.

configStructure.name: returnZip
configStructure.description: If true, it enables the client to download a zip of the artifacts.
